channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Peasant (Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
**Peasant** - A mixture of the King's ditched "royal blood" ability and some silly fun. Similar to an evil Inquisitor, who doesn't need a specific class to exist in order to be in the game.
Passive: **Cloak of Dung** - You cannot be investigated. (Will return typical block message.)
Day Ability: **Repressed Dissent** - Cause your own votes for treason to be hidden, and your own vote of execute/pardon to appear reversed. (Unlimited)
_^ Your vote still counts as you've actually voted, but everyone will SEE your Execute or Pardon vote come up as the opposite. "Hey, I voted to pardon the Princess, don't blame me."_
Night Ability 1: **I Didn't Vote For You** - Detect whether a player has royal blood. (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: **Poison Potato** - Attack a player. If they have royal blood, you will kill them. (3 uses)
Goal: Murder or successfully vote to execute 2 players with royal blood.
Lore: Your name's Dennis.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Peasant (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
It’s a dumb Simpsons reference. Mr. Burns’ family killed each other with poisoned potatoes. Just an idiotic joke name. Lore-wise, potatoes seemed like a good thing for peasants to be able to get their hands on.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Peasant (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
Peasant - A mixture of the King’s ditched “royal blood” ability and some silly fun. Similar to an evil Inquisitor, who doesn’t need a specific class to exist in order to be in the game.

Passive:
Cloak of Dung - You cannot be investigated. (Will return typical block message.)

Day Ability:
Repressed Dissent - Cause your own votes for treason to be hidden, and your own vote of execute/pardon to appear reversed. (Unlimited)

^ Your vote still counts as you’ve actually voted, but everyone will SEE your Execute or Pardon vote come up as the opposite. “Hey, I voted to pardon the Princess, don’t blame me.”

Night Ability 1:
I Didn’t Vote For You - Detect whether a player has royal blood. (Unlimited)

Night Ability 2:
Poison Potato - Attack a player. If they have royal blood, you will kill them. (3 uses)

Goal:
Murder or successfully vote to execute 2 players with royal blood.

Lore:
Your name’s Dennis.

Read full topic
